metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29462 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Portable SDK for UPnP Devices is an SDK for development of UPnP device and control point applications. The server part of pupnp (libupnp) appears to be vulnerable to DNS rebinding attacks because it does not check the value of the `Host` header. This can be mitigated by using DNS revolvers which block DNS-rebinding attacks. The vulnerability is fixed in version 1.14.6 and later.

criterions.comment: libupnp package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
mediatomb package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
